org.jsfml.window.event

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsfml.window.event.Event
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JoystickEvent, KeyEvent, MouseEvent, SizeEvent, TextEvent

    public class Event
extends Object
    Base class for window events.

    Window events must be polled from a window on a regular basis to keep the window responsive.

    Events are of a certain type, some of which provide additional data. For various special types, subclasses of this class exist. This class provides convenience methods to cast Event objects to one of these special subclasses (e.g. asKeyEvent(), which will cast the event to a KeyEvent, if possible).

    See Also:
    Window.pollEvents(), Event.Type

    • Constructor Detail

      • Event

        public Event(int type)
        Constructs a new event.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the event. This must be a valid ordinal in the Event.Type enumeration.

    • Method Detail

      • asJoystickButtonEvent

        public JoystickButtonEvent asJoystickButtonEvent()
        Attempts to cast this event to a JoystickButtonEvent.
        Returns:
        the event cast to a JoystickButtonEvent if its type is either Event.Type.JOYSTICK_BUTTON_PRESSED or Event.Type.JOYSTICK_BUTTON_RELEASED, null otherwise.

      • asJoystickEvent

        public JoystickEvent asJoystickEvent()
        Attempts to cast this event to a JoystickEvent.
        Returns:
        the event cast to a JoystickEvent if its type is one of Event.Type.JOYSTICK_CONNECETED, Event.Type.JOYSTICK_DISCONNECTED, Event.Type.JOYSTICK_BUTTON_PRESSED, Event.Type.JOYSTICK_BUTTON_RELEASED or Event.Type.JOYSTICK_MOVED, null otherwise.

      • asJoystickMoveEvent

        public JoystickMoveEvent asJoystickMoveEvent()
        Attempts to cast this event to a JoystickMoveEvent.
        Returns:
        the event cast to a JoystickButtonEvent if its type is Event.Type.JOYSTICK_MOVED, null otherwise.

      • asKeyEvent

        public KeyEvent asKeyEvent()
        Attempts to cast this event to a KeyEvent.
        Returns:
        the event cast to a KeyEvent if its type is either Event.Type.KEY_PRESSED or Event.Type.KEY_RELEASED, null otherwise.

      • asMouseButtonEvent

        public MouseButtonEvent asMouseButtonEvent()
        Attempts to cast this event to a MouseButtonEvent.
        Returns:
        the event cast to a MouseButtonEvent if its type is either Event.Type.MOUSE_BUTTON_PRESSED or Event.Type.MOUSE_BUTTON_RELEASED, null otherwise.

      • asMouseEvent

        public MouseEvent asMouseEvent()
        Attempts to cast this event to a MouseEvent.
        Returns:
        the event cast to a MouseEvent if its type is one of Event.Type.MOUSE_ENTERED, Event.Type.MOUSE_MOVED, Event.Type.MOUSE_LEFT, Event.Type.MOUSE_BUTTON_PRESSED, Event.Type.MOUSE_BUTTON_RELEASED or Event.Type.MOUSE_WHEEL_MOVED, null otherwise.

      • asMouseWheelEvent

        public MouseWheelEvent asMouseWheelEvent()
        Attempts to cast this event to a MouseWheelEvent.
        Returns:
        the event cast to a MouseWheelEvent if its type is Event.Type.MOUSE_WHEEL_MOVED, null otherwise.

      • asSizeEvent

        public SizeEvent asSizeEvent()
        Attempts to cast this event to a SizeEvent.
        Returns:
        the event cast to a SizeEvent if its type is Event.Type.RESIZED, null otherwise.

      • asTextEvent

        public TextEvent asTextEvent()
        Attempts to cast this event to a TextEvent.
        Returns:
        the event cast to a TextEvent if its type is Event.Type.TEXT_ENTERED, null otherwise.
